records.QueryText: Information regarding how to control Bacterial Leaf Blight in Gwar?
records.KccAns:
Information regarding how to control Bacterial Leaf Blight in Gwar?
Spray 12 gm. Streptocyclin + 200 ml. Hexaconazole in 200 lt. of water per acre.

records.QueryText: Information regarding fertilizers dose in Basmati?
records.KccAns: Fertilizers dose in Basmati:- 36 kg. Urea in Pusa Basmati, 54 kg. Urea in Pusa Punjab Basmati-1509, 27 kg. DAP, 25 kg. Zinc (21%). Skip phosphorus application to rice if recommended dose of phosphorus had been applied to the preceeding wheat crop.
